question: 下着
sourceMnemonic: The things you <kanji>wear</kanji> <kanji>below</kanji> your other clothes. That is your <vocabulary>underwear</vocabulary>. You do wear underwear, right?
sourceReadingMnemonic: The reading for this one is all kun'yomi vocab reading, but you should know these by now. <ja>着</ja> uses the reading you learned with <ja>着る</ja>, but this word employs that pesky rendaku, so remember that <ja>き</ja> becomes <ja>ぎ</ja> here.
